text:
Roberto-Hoberto!
Glad you could make it.

This is what I'm talking about.
Men being men.

Great attitude,
and congratulations

- on passing the first test.
- First test?

Oh, you think all you had to do
to join is a few clicks

- around the internet?
- Easy, Doug. He's fired up.

No, there's just one more test
for you to pass.

Question is,
are you man enough?
I am.
Put this on.

We will now take you
to the secret location
of your final initiation.
To the cages!

- Yeah, come on.
- ( whimpers )

- Oh, you mean batting cages.
- Now to pass this test,

you must do more
than swing this.

You must summon all of
the anger, the resentment,

the rage you feel towards
the woman that wronged you
and channel it into that bat.
I'll demonstrate.

Andrea leaving was the best
thing that ever happened to me!

Now I can leave
the TV volume up

as late at night
as I want to!

Now I can count potatoes
as a vegetable!

And now I can leave
the toilet seat up

after I'm done
using the toilet!

- Whoo!
- ( screams )
Whoo! Whoo!

- You try.
- Okay.

Lyla dumping me
was the best thing
that's ever happened to me!

Now I won't get blamed
for things
like random animal attacks.

And it's not like
I didn't go back for her.

I called her name
and everything.

But does she care about that?
Uh, no!

Of course, if it was a bear,
she could've been really hurt.
Like really, really hurt.

And I guess it's why
she got mad at me

for, like, staging
the fake attack

and just looking out
for myself in the end

instead of thinking about her
and apologizing.
I'm... I am...
I'm sad.

I really messed up,
and I lost her.
I miss Andrea, too. I do.

It's okay.
It's going to be okay.
